SocialMediaPosting.headline: Miss Sarah Kirmeyer’s Story - Pittsburgh Student - TodayPGH
SocialMediaPosting.text:
“One day, I hope for peace and safety for everyone…”

– Miss Sarah Kirmeyer, Senior Student @ https://www.todaypgh.com/story/2020/hope-peace-safety-everyone/
